data.eml:eml: A new diminutive sisorid catfish (Actinopterygii: Siluriformes) from northeastern India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Heok Hee, Lalronunga, Samuel (2016): A new diminutive sisorid catfish (Actinopterygii: Siluriformes) from northeastern India. Zootaxa 4105 (6): 546-556, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4105.6.2
